title: stream_resource
description: Document to reference a collection (e.g. file or group of files) of externally-stored data streams

data_key.title: Data Key
data_key.description: A string to show which data_key of the Descriptor are being streamed

resource_kwargs.title: Resource Kwargs
resource_kwargs.description: Additional argument to pass to the Handler to read a Stream Resource

resource_path.title: Resource Path
resource_path.description: Filepath or URI for locating this resource

root.title: Root
root.description: Subset of resource_path that is a local detail, not semantic.

run_start.title: Run Start
run_start.description: Globally unique ID to the run_start document this Stream Resource is associated with.

spec.title: Spec
spec.description: String identifying the format/type of this Stream Resource, used to identify a compatible Handler

uid.title: Uid
uid.description: Globally unique identifier for this Stream Resource
